page.title: 09A Day in the Life of a Mum
page.content: My mum gets up between 7.00 and 7.30. She gets us up at about 7.55,then when we have gone to school she does the house work. Then she goes to see her mum and dad.She does the shopping for her mum and herself,then takes it back to her mum's house.She then goes home to cook her dinner,then washes up and tidies up the mess that Ben has made with his toys.She then sits down to watch Sons and Daughters.At about 5.00 my mum has the tea ready for us.At 6.00 she goes to work and comes home at 10.00.(She works at a factory making calenders).When she gets home she gets ready for bed and has a cup of tea. She then watches T.V. for a while and goes to bed at about 11.30. by Stephanie Thomas
